segments.text: ( while shaking hands ) I am Zhang Wei , nice to meet you , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am Smith , the personnel director . Please have a seat , son .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Have you received my resume ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I haven â€™ t had time to look it over . Did you bring another copy with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , here you are , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
